News.headline: Loan Update: Jacob Berkowicz
News.short_description: The Daggers' youngster Jacob Berkowicz is continuing to Impress at Essex Senior League side Barkingside
News.description:
Jacob Berkowicz scored twice as Barkingside continued their good form in the Essex Senior League to defeat Wadham Lodge 6-2 at Cricklefield.

The Daggers’ youngster opened the scoring on 22 minutes and got his second of the afternoon on 52 minutes as Barkingside registered their second consecutive victory in the ESL to move up to eighth in the table.

Berkowicz has now scored three goals in as many games for Gus Gulfer’s side and will be looking to add further to his tally against FC Romania today before his loan is up at the end of December.
